          <title>
            <string language="en">Universal indicator spectrum</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Universalindikatorspektrum</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Spectre universel d'indicateur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Spectrum universal do indicador</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Spettro universale dell'indicatore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καθολικό φάσμα δεικτών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Espectro universal del indicador</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the spectrum of a universal indicator. The direction of increasing acidity and increasing alkalinity is indicated.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">acid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">acidity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">alkali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">alkalinity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">colour</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">neutral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">universal indicator</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt das Spektrum einer 
Universalanzeige. Die Richtung der zunehmenden Säure und der 
zunehmenden Alkalinität wird angezeigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre le spectre d'un 
indicateur universel. La direction de l'acidité croissante et 
de l'alcalinité croissante est indiquée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o spectrum de um 
indicador universal. O sentido do acidity crescente e do 
alkalinity crescente é indicado.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra lo spettro di un 
indicatore universale. Il senso dell'acidità aumentante e 
dell'alcalinità aumentante è indicato.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει το φάσμα ενός καθολικού 
δείκτη. Η κατεύθυνση της αυξανόμενης οξύτητας και της 
αυξανόμενης αλκαλικότητας είναι υποδειγμένη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra el espectro de un 
indicador universal. La dirección de la acidez de aumento y de 
la alcalinidad de aumento se indica.</string>
          </description>
